title: Quentin Tarantino
summary: Quentin Jerome Tarantino[2] (/ˌtærənˈtiːnoʊ/; born March 27, 1963)[3] is an American film director, screenwriter, producer, film critic, and actor. His films are characterized by nonlinear storylines, dark humor, stylized violence, extended dialogue, ensemble casts, references to popular culture, alternate history, and neo-noir.
